Package org.apache.turbine.services.assemblerbroker.util.python

Klasse PythonScreenFactory

java.lang.Object
org.apache.turbine.services.assemblerbroker.util.python.PythonBaseFactory<Screen>
org.apache.turbine.services.assemblerbroker.util.python.PythonScreenFactory
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Loader<Screen>, AssemblerFactory<Screen>
public class PythonScreenFactory extends PythonBaseFactory<Screen>
A screen factory that attempts to load a python class in the JPython interpreter and execute it as a Turbine screen. The JPython script should inherit from Turbine Screen or one of its subclasses.
Version:
$Id$
Autor:
Leon Messerschmidt, Henning P. Schmiedehausen
